page.title: 07Malpas Church Junior School
page.content: Today we went to visit {Malpas Church Junior School.}We went into the library and asked Mr.Granger, the headmaster,questions. The new school is seven years old but the old school was 100 years old.They have{231 children}in the Juniors in 8 classes. We saw children working and thought the classrooms were small but the work on the walls was lovely and colourful. There are 2{computers}in the school. The children wear a{school uniform}and have a badge. Sometimes the children do{pottery} and{cookery}.They use a small room for this.The school hall is small compared with ours at Millbrook Junior School. They have a large{field}and around it there are modern houses.We took photographs of what we saw. Gillian Jamie 2S
